attributes.action: Stop budget cuts to vital services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop budget cuts to the MOD, the NHS, education, police, fire services and transport. These servcies are vital for a country to function properly. There is a war is Afghanistan yet there are planned MOD budget cuts. There is an Ageing population in this country yet the NHS is a lauging stock. There may be a recession but these services are vital and lives depend on it.
